engine
Class TestingEngine

java.lang.Object
  engine.TestingEngine
public class TestingEngine
extends java.lang.Object

The main control engine for the testing side of the program. TestingEngine contains an array of ValueLists, and communicates with the Gui to display the experiments. TestingEngine recieves the user's responses from the Gui, and records them in a .csv file.

Field Detail

isExample

public boolean isExample
Whether current stimuli are examples

Constructor Detail

TestingEngine

public TestingEngine(BullRunner aoc,
                     Student student,
                     Gui gui)
Creates a new instance of TestingEngine.

Parameters:
aoc - The main BullRunner
student - The current student using the program
gui - The main Gui

TestingEngine

public TestingEngine(BullRunner aoc,
                     Gui gui)
Creates a new instance of TestingEngine for a practice begin. No student is created, and no data is saved.

Parameters:
aoc - The main BullRunner
gui - The main Gui
Method Detail

createValueLists

public boolean createValueLists()
Called by the BullRunner to create an array of experimental stimuli. If there are no .csv files in the /Stimuli/ folder, this returns False.

Returns:
True if succeeds in creating an array of ValueLists

checkTester

public void checkTester()
Confirms to the Logger that the testing engine has been created (to avoid order-of-creation errors).

begin

public void begin()
Sets up the introductions to be displayed and makes the Gui visible

beginFromMidpoint

public void beginFromMidpoint()
If student has already begun test and an earlier time, and selects to begin from where s/he left off, this will begin from that point.

deleteOriginalFiles

public void deleteOriginalFiles()
Deprecated. since v 0.9

Deletes saved data files. This has been deprecated, to avoid unnecessary deletion. Data files are now replaced as student progresses.

runNextSubtest

public void runNextSubtest()
If there are any subtests left, displays the next subtest.

userAction

public void userAction(java.lang.String choice,
                       java.lang.String time)
This is begin when a user makes a choice on a stimulus. User's action is recorded, and the next experimental stimulus is displayed.

Parameters:
choice - The user's choice: Left = 0, Right = 1
time - The time taken by the user

displayNext

public void displayNext()
Displays the next stimulus in the subtest.

sendValuesToGui

public void sendValuesToGui(java.lang.String[] values)
Sends stimulus information to the GUI to be displayed on the sceen.

Parameters:
values - Words or image/sound filenames to be diaplyed on GUI.

testHasExamples

public boolean testHasExamples()
Returns:
True if stim file includes examples.

displayNextExample

public void displayNextExample()
Displayes next example on GUI.

checkExampleAnswer

public void checkExampleAnswer(int choice)
Checks that answer student gave to an example question was correct.

Parameters:
choice - Student's choice.

recordAction

public void recordAction(java.lang.String choice,
                         java.lang.String time)
Record user's choice and time in .csv file. If choice is correct, record True, else record False.

Parameters:
choice - The user's choice: Left = 0, Right = 1
time - The time taken by the user

updateGuiType

public void updateGuiType()
Changes the gui depending on the current subtest. Called by the Gui when a key is pressed during instructions.
